p.k: §5Blessed by neptune my helmet allowed me to breath underwater.
p.v: §5在海王的保佑下,我的头盔可以让我在水下呼吸。

p.k: §6[Full set Bonus] : §fgrants effect Cisco's Might.
p.v: [全套装备奖励]: §f获得效果西斯科之力。

p.k: §a[Key Press Ability] : §fCisco's Clarity. (default  key [x] )
p.v: §a[按键触发]: §f西思科的明晰 （默认键[x])

p.k: §5The legendary sword of balance empowered by holy light.
p.v: §5圣光加持下的传奇天平之刃。

p.k: §6[Unique Effect] Absolute Equillibrium : §fdoes 4 percent of target max hp as true damage and grants 15 percent damage reduction.
p.v: §6[独特效果]:绝对天平:§f以目标最大生命值的4%作为真实伤害,并给予15%的伤害减免。

p.k: §a[Right Click Ability] §fgrants a large temporary boost to hp and attack speed.
p.v: §a[右键能力]§f暂时提升大量的生命值和攻击速度。

p.k: §dThe "lawbringers " were a race of celestial beings who dealt judgement to gods who commited any one of the unique set of unforgiveable crimes.
p.v: §d执法者是一个天神种族 他们对犯下任何一种不可饶恕罪行的天神进行审判

p.k: §6[Unique Effect] : Divine Justice : §fDeals significant damage to targets below 20 percent health.
p.v: §6[独特效果]:神圣正义:§f对生命值低于20%的目标造成显著伤害。

p.k: §a[Right Click Ability] : §fCleanses certain negative effects and grants a heal effect.
p.v: §a[右键技能]:§f清除特定的负面效果并提供治疗效果。

p.k: §6[Full Set Bonus]: Bravery: §fGrants 10 percent damage reduction.
p.v: §6[全套装备奖励]：§f勇气：提供10%的伤害减免。

p.k: §6[Full Set Bonus]: Bravery: §fGrants 10 percent damage reduction.
p.v: §6[全套装备奖励]：§f勇气：提供10%的伤害减免。

p.k: §6[Full Set Bonus]: Bravery: §fGrants 10 percent damage reduction.
p.v: §6[全套装备奖励]：§f勇气：提供10%的伤害减免。

p.k: §6[Full Set Bonus]: Bravery: §fGrants 10 percent damage reduction.
p.v: §6[全套装备奖励]：§f勇气：提供10%的伤害减免。

p.k: Grants + 5 luck when worn.
p.v: 佩戴后幸运值+5。

p.k: Grants + 20 percent swim speed when worn.
p.v: 佩戴后游泳速度+20%。

p.k: Grants + 10 max health when worn.
p.v: 佩戴后最大生命+10。

p.k: Dark essence extracted from an ancient material. Used to craft powerful arcane items.
p.v: 从一种古老材料中提取的黑暗精华。用于制作强大的奥术物品。

p.k: A magical tool used to extract the essence from certain arcane materials.
p.v: 用于从特定奥数材料中提取精华的魔法工具。

p.k: §6[Full Set Bonus]: Advent of Ascension: §fWhen above 50 percent hp grants a strong boost to main offensive and defensive stats.
p.v: §6[全套装备奖励]：§f天神降临：当生命值高于50%时，主要攻防属性大幅提升。

p.k: §6[Full Set Bonus]: Lights Blessing: §fSaves the user from fatal damage once every 10 mins.
p.v: §6[全套装备奖励]：§f光之祝福：每10分钟可一次性拯救使用者免受致命伤害。

p.k: §a[On Key Press]: §9Azure Ascendant: §fHeals nearby players and removes certain negative effects. (default x)

p.k: §dA small portion of the thunder gods's power sealed in a blade.
p.v: §d少量雷神之力封印在刀刃中

p.k: §6[Unique Effect] : Azure Judgment §fperiodically calls lightning to strike enemies hit by it's blade.
p.v: §6[独特效果]：蔚蓝审判：§f定期召唤闪电打击被其击中的敌人。

p.k: §a[Right Click Ability] : §fstrikes all nearby entities with lightning and temporarily boosts speed.
p.v: §a[右键技能]：§f用闪电打击附近所有实体，并临时提高速度。

p.k: §dThis legendary ring is given upon attaining the rank of sage within the order of the owl.
p.v: §d这枚传说中的戒指是在猫头鹰骑士团中获得贤者等级时赠送的。

p.k: §fGrants 20 percent increased health and armor when worn.
p.v: §f佩戴后，生命值和护甲提高 20%。

p.k: Grants + 50 percent knockback resistance when worn.

p.k: Essence of light extracted from brightsteel. Used to craft powerful arcane items.
p.v: 从亮钢中提取的光之精华。用于制作强大的奥术物品。

p.k: §dA pristine pickaxe forged with brightsteel alloy. Grants a small boost to mining speed upon use.
p.v: §d一把用亮钢合金锻造的纯净镐子。使用时可小幅提升采矿速度。

p.k: Pristine metal alloy used to craft and repair tools and armor.
p.v: 用于制作和修复工具和盔甲的纯净金属合金。

p.k: §dTough armor forged with brightsteel alloy.
p.v: §d用亮钢合金锻造的坚固盔甲。

p.v: §6[全套装备奖励]：宙斯盾: §f当生命值超过80%时，会获得一个小的抗性BUFF。

p.k: §dTough armor forged with brightsteel alloy.
p.v: §d用亮钢合金锻造的坚固盔甲。

p.k: An effecient all purpose tool fashioned with brightsteel alloy.
p.v: 这是一个采用亮钢合金制造的高效多功能工具。

p.k: Diamond refined and enhanced by powerful magic. Used to craft tools and armor.
p.v: 通过强大魔法提炼和强化的钻石。用于制作工具和盔甲。

p.k: §6[Unique Effect] Gemini Blight : §fEnemies hit by this weapon are afflicted with the gemini blight effect which does a small out of armor ignoring damage over time.
p.v: §6[独特效果]双子座疫病：§f被这把武器击中的敌人会受到双子座疫病的影响，在一段时间内造成少量无视护甲的伤害。

p.k: §dA pristine coin minted for the celebration of momentous events.
p.v: §d为庆祝重大事件而铸造的纯净硬币。

p.k: §5Blessed by Mercury my boots granted me a powerful jump.
p.v: §5在水神的保佑下，我的靴子给了我强力跳跃。

p.k: §6[Full set Bonus] : §fgrants effect Cisco's Might.
p.v: §6[全套装备奖励]：§f获得效果西斯科之力

p.k: §a[Key Press Ability] : §fCisco's Clarity. (default  key [x] )
p.v: §a[按键触发]: §f西思科的明晰 （默认键[x]）

p.k: §5Blessed by Apollo my leggings granted me speed.
p.v: §5在水神的保佑下，我的靴子给了我速度。

p.k: §6[Full set Bonus] : §fgrants effect Cisco's Might.
p.v: §6[全套装备奖励]：§f获得效果西斯科之力

p.v: §a[按键触发]: §f西思科的明晰 （默认键[x]）

p.k: §5Blessed by Hercules my chestplate granted me divine protection.
p.v: §5在大力神的保佑下，我的胸甲给了我神圣保护。

p.k: §6[Full set Bonus] : §fgrants effect Cisco's Might.
p.v: §6[全套装备奖励]：§f获得效果西斯科之力

p.k: §a[Key Press Ability] : §fCisco's Clarity. (default  key [x] )
p.v: §a[按键触发]: §f西思科的明晰 （默认键[x]）

p.k: Grants + 6 armor when worn.
p.v: 佩戴后可获得+6护甲。

p.k: §5A charm corrupted by something very sinister. §fWhen above 80 percent hp constantly damages the wearer. When below 80 percent hp grants a small boost to attack,speed,armor and armor toughness.
p.v: §5张被邪恶之物侵蚀的符咒 §f当HP高于80%时会持续伤害佩戴者 当生命值低于80%时，攻击、速度、护甲和护甲韧性会略有提升。

p.k: A magical item attuned to the element of dark used as a power source for certain items.
p.v: 一种与黑暗元素相适应的魔法物品，可作为某些物品的能量源。

p.k: §5A pickaxe forged with the most powerful of ancient materials . Grants a big boost to mining speed on use.
p.v: §5一把用最强大的古代材料锻造的镐。使用时可大幅提升采矿速度。

p.k: Empowered with dark magic this alloy is used to craft powerful tools and armor.
p.v: 这种合金被赋予了黑暗魔法，可用于制作强大的工具和盔甲。

p.k: §dAn ancient tool crafted with the most resilient metals leading to unparalleled efficiency.
p.v: §d用最坚韧的金属打造的古老工具，带来无与伦比的效率。

p.k: §5An ingot of pure demonium, prolonged exposure will break even the strongest mind.
p.v: §5纯净的恶魔之锭，长久暴露在外，即使是最强大的心神也会因此崩溃。

p.k: §bA brilliant ruby infused with powerful magic used to craft tools and armor.
p.v: §b一颗璀璨的红宝石，注入了强大的魔力，用来制作工具和盔甲。

p.k: A magical item attuned to the element of fire used as a power source for certain items.
p.v: 一种与火元素相协调的魔法物品，可作为某些物品的能量源。

p.k: §5The legendary sword of balance. Once wielded by a great hero.
p.v: §5传说中的天平之剑,曾经被一位伟大的英雄挥舞

p.k: §6[Unique Effect] Equillibrium : §fdoes 4 percent of target max hp as true damage.
p.v: §6[独特效果]天平之刃：§f造成目标最大生命值 4% 的真实伤害。

p.k: §a[Right Click Ability] §fgrants a temporary boost to hp.
p.v: §a[右键技能] §f暂时提升HP。

p.k: §5A hero consumed by darkness.
p.v: §5被黑暗吞噬的英雄。

p.k: §6[Full set Bonus] : §fwhen below 80 percent hp grants effect:
p.v: §6[全套装备奖励]：§f当功率低于 80% 时，获得效果：

p.k: §4Unrelenting Dark: §fgain increased attack, armor toughness, speed and armor.
p.v: §4无情黑暗: §f增加攻击、护甲韧性、速度和护甲。

p.k: §a[Key Press Ability] : §4Onslaught's End : §fcleanes wither and poison effects and heals the user (default  key [x])
p.v: §a[按键触发]: §4终结猛击：§4清除凋零和中毒效果并治疗使用者（默认键 [x])

p.k: §dA mysterious shard of dark crystal found only in the realm of the fallen.
p.v: §d一块神秘的黑暗水晶碎片，只有在堕落之境才能找到。

p.k: §5The fell King Arthas responsible for the almost complete annihilation of the gods.
p.v: §5堕落之王阿尔萨斯对诸神的几乎完全毁灭负有责任。

p.k: §6[Unique Effect]: Brokkr: §fReduces damage taken by 25 percent.
p.v: §6[独特效果]：Brokkr：§f将受到的伤害降低 25%。

p.k: §6[Unique Effect]: Sokkvabekkr: §fReflects 30 percent of damage taken back to the attacker.
p.v: §a[独特效果]：Sokkvabekkr：§f将受到的伤害的 30% 反射给攻击者。

p.k: §5The fell King Arthas responsible for the almost complete annihilation of the gods.

p.v: §a[独特效果]：索克瓦贝克：§f将受到的伤害的 30% 反射给攻击者。

p.k: §5The Fell King's weapon of choice.
p.v: §5堕落之王的首选武器

p.k: §6[Unique Effect]: Ragnarok: §fDeals bonus armor ignoring damage.
p.v: §6[独特效果]：万神陨落：§f造成无视护甲的额外伤害。

p.k: §6[Unique Effect]: Fensalir: §fInflicts weakness to enemies on hit.
p.v: §a[独特效果]：芬撒里尔：§f击中敌人时会造成虚弱效果。

p.k: §5An ingot of pure frigidium, no flame can be born in it's prescence.
p.v: §d纯净的极寒之锭，在它面前无法诞生火焰。

p.k: §dArmored Robes of the master assassin.
p.v: §d刺客大师的装甲长袍。

p.k: §6[Full Set Bonus]: Nimble Feet : §fBoosts speed.
p.v: §6[全套装备奖励]：灵巧的双脚：§f增加速度。

p.k: §a[Key Press Ability]: Supernatural Reflexes : §fDodges all incoming attacks for 3 seconds. default key [x]]
p.v: §a[按键触发]：超自然反应：§f闪避所有攻击，持续3秒。 默认键 [x］

p.k: A magical item attuned to the element of ice used as a power source for certain items.
p.v: 一种与冰元素相调和的魔法物品，可作为某些物品的能量源。

p.k: §dA legendary axe passed down and wielded by the leader of the frost tribe.
p.v: §d一把由冰霜部落首领挥舞、流传至今的传奇斧头。

p.k: §6[Unique Effect]: Glacies' Bite: §fSlows enemies on hit.
p.v: §6[独特效果]：格拉西斯之咬：§f攻击时减速敌人

p.k: §a[Right Click Ability]: Entomb: §fEncase your armor in ice granting a sharp boost to armor but inflicts slowness.
p.v: §a[右键能力]：埋葬：§f用冰块包裹盔甲，大幅提升护甲，但会造成减速。

p.k: §fA powerful artifact used by mages long ago. Capable of teleporting a user to thier home when in the overworld.
p.v: §f很久以前法师们使用的强大神器。它能在主世界将使用者传送到他们家。

p.k: A magical item attuned to the element of wind used as a power source for certain items.
p.v: 一种与风元素相协调的魔法物品，可作为某些物品的能量源。

p.k: §5A fallen hero's blade.
p.v: §5倒下的英雄的利刃

p.k: §6[Unique Effect]: §4Vengeful Equillibrium : §fDeals 2 percent of target max health as true damage and deals significant damage to targets under 25 percent health.
p.v: §6[独特效果]：复仇天平：§f将目标最大生命值的2%作为真实伤害，并对生命值低于25%的目标造成重大伤害。

p.k: §a[Right Click Ability] : §fgrants increased attack and attack speed but inflicts the wither effect.
p.v: §a[右键能力]：§f可提高攻击力和攻击速度，但会造成凋零效果。

p.k: Amethyst refined and enhanced by powerful magic. Used to craft tools and armor.
p.v: 经过强大魔法提炼和强化的紫水晶。用于制作工具和盔甲。

p.k: §6[Unique effect] : Inseperable : §fIf castor is in your offhand grants 30 percent increased attack and attack speed otherwise inflicts slowness.
p.v: §6[独特效果]：不可逆：§f如果北河二在你的左手中，则攻击和攻击速度提高 30%，否则会造成缓慢。

p.k: §5The divine ruby enhanced to it's limits by combining it with volatile materials. Can only be contained by the most powerful tools and armor.
p.v: §5神圣的红宝石通过与不稳定的材料结合而达到极限。只有最强大的工具和盔甲才能容纳它

p.k: §5Crystalised solar energy used to breathe life into arcane jewels.
p.v: §5晶化的太阳能为神秘的珠宝注入生命。

p.k: Brightsteel alloy in it's unrefined form.
p.v: 未经精炼的亮钢合金。

p.k: §5A lighter more agile version of Equillibrium made by the blacksmith arthas by modifying Cisco's Original.
p.v: §5铁匠阿尔萨斯通过对西斯科的原版天平之刃进行改装，制造出了更轻更灵活的天平之刃

p.k: §6[Unique Effect] Expedient Equillibrium: §fdeals 2 percent of target max hp as true damage.
p.v: §6[独特效果]：灵活天平：§f造成目标最大生命值 2% 的真实伤害。

p.k: §a[Right Click Ability] : §fTemporarily boosts health and attack speed.
p.v: §a[右键能力]：§f暂时提升生命值和攻击速度。

p.k: §6[Unique Effect] Windblessed : §f Negates fall damage and grants jump boost when in main hand.
p.v: §6[独特效果]风之祝福：§f使用时可抵消坠落伤害并获得跳跃加成。

p.k: §a[Right Click Ability] : §fA gust of wind lifts and propels you through the air.
p.v: §a[右键能力]：§f一阵风将你托起，推动你在空中飞翔。

p.k: This legendary sword is dormant without the divine ruby as a power source.
p.v: 如果没有神圣红宝石作为动力源，这把传奇之剑就会处于休眠状态。

p.k: §5Armor worn by the third fell king Sylvi.
p.v: §5第三代陨落之王希尔维所穿的盔甲。

p.k: §6[Full Set Bonus]: Fensalir-Iss: §fReduces incoming damage by 20 percent and grants a 10 percent boost to health.
p.v: §6[全套装备奖励]：芬撒里尔-伊斯：§f将受到的伤害降低 20%，并将生命值提高 10%。

p.k: §6[Full Set Bonus]: Fellfrost: §fBoosts attack by 7% of total health.
p.v: §6[全套装备奖励]：落霜：§f提升总生命值 7% 的攻击力。

p.k: §5Armor worn by the third fell king Sylvi.
p.v: §5第三代陨落之王希尔维所穿的盔甲。

p.v: §6[全套装备奖励]：落霜：§f提升总生命值 7% 的攻击力。

p.k: §5A powerful item used to unlock the full potential of divine equipment. (Can be obtained by defeating the fell king.)
p.v: §5用于释放神圣装备全部潜能的强大物品。(可通过击败堕落之王获得）

p.k: §dA powerful artifact tainted by the dark crystal used on the podium of purgatory to summon and challenge the fellking.
p.v: §d被黑暗水晶污染的强大神器，在炼狱台桌上使用来召唤和挑战堕落之王

p.k: §dA powerful artifact used to summon and challenge cisco.
p.v: §d用于召唤和挑战西思科的强大神器。

p.k: A magical item attuned to the element of thunder used as a power source for certain items.
p.v: 一种与雷元素契合的魔法物品，可作为某些物品的能量源。

p.k: A special core which is highly sensitive to and can contain the power of the elements. Can also take on any shape the user wishes granting it unmatched  utility in the forging of powerful equipment.
p.v: 一种特殊的核心，对元素的力量高度敏感，并能容纳元素的力量。它还能按照使用者的意愿变成任何形状，在锻造强大装备方面具有无与伦比的实用性。

p.k: A magical item attuned to the element of wind used as a power source for certain items.
p.v: 一种与风元素相协调的魔法物品，可作为某些物品的能量源。

p.k: §6[ Full Set Bonus ] : Galeforce : §fGrants  the ability to jump mid air by tapping [space]. Then gives slowfalling.
p.v: §6[全套装备奖励]: Galeforce : §f通过点击 [空格]，获得在空中跳跃的能力。然后获得缓慢下落的能力。

p.k: §6[ Full Set Bonus ] : Galeforce : §fGrants  the ability to jump mid air by tapping [space]. Then gives slowfalling.

p.k: §dArmor plated with darksteel for increased protection.
p.v: §d用暗钢加固的装甲板,以增加保护。

p.k: §6[Full Set Bonus]: Aegis Impervium : §fOnce every 5 mins if damage taken is greater than max hp survive with 10 hp and gain 3 second temporary invunerability.
p.v: §6[全套装备奖励]:Aegis Impervium :§f如果玩家在5分钟内受到的伤害大于最大生命值(HP),那么玩家将保留10点生命值并触发以下效果;获得3秒的免伤。

p.k: §6[Full Set Bonus]: Resilience : §fGain a small resistance buff.
p.v: §6[全套装备奖励]: Resilience : §f获得小幅抗性buff

p.k: §dDragon's breath awakened and refined for the crafting of powerful tools and equipment.
p.v: §d由龙息精炼而来,用于制作更强大的工具和设备

p.k: A relic which can briefly open the gateway to the realm of the fallen. Used to pull the fell king to the overworld with a tainted talisman.
p.v: 一个遗物，可以短暂地打开通往堕落之境的大门。使用一个受污染的护身符把堕落的国王召唤到地上。
